# Import Data

The following datasets are used in this exercise.

-   `TAIWAN_VILLAGE_2020`, a geospatial data of village boundary of Taiwan. It is in ESRI shapefile format. The data is in Taiwan Geographic Coordinate System TWD97. (Source: [data.gov.tw](https://data.gov.tw/en/datasets/130549))

    -   Version 1091030

-   `Dengue_Daily.csv`, an aspatial data of reported dengue cases in Taiwan since 1998.
